text: December to Dismember (1995) was a professional wrestling event made by Extreme Championship Wrestling (ECW). It took place on December 9, 1995 at the ECW Arena in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. It was the first December to Dismember event held by ECW. ==Results== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Dances with Dudley and Dudley Dudley defeated Bad Crew (#1 and #2). Tag team match 2:00 2 Taz defeated El Puerto Rique√±o. Singles match 3:26 3 Hack Meyers defeated Bruiser Mastino. Singles match 6:15 4 The Eliminators (Perry Saturn and John Kronus) defeated The Pitbulls (#1 and #2). Tag team match 9:30 5 Raven defeated Tommy Dreamer. Singles match 8:45 6 JT Smith defeated Tony Stetson. Singles match 5:04 7 The Sandman defeated Mikey Whipwreck (c) and Steve Austin. Three Way Dance for the ECW World Heavyweight Championship 19:45 8 The Public Enemy (Rocco Rock and Johnny Grunge) defeated The Heavenly Bodies (Tom Prichard and Jimmy Del Ray). Tag team match 8:46 9 The Public Enemy, The Pitbulls, and Tommy Dreamer defeated The Heavenly Bodies, The Eliminators, Raven, and Stevie Richards. Ultimate Jeopardy Steel Cage match 21:00 ==References== Category:1995 in professional wrestling Category:Extreme Championship Wrestling Category:Sports in Philadelphia Category:1995 in the United States Category:1990s in Philadelphia
title: December to Dismember (1995)
